meanings.definition: A decorative screen or wall behind the altar in a church.
meanings.sent1: The intricate reredos added a touch of elegance to the church.
meanings.sent2: The priest stood in front of the beautiful reredos during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the reredos was a secret door to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streaming through the stained glass windows danced on the reredos.
meanings.sent5: Visitors were in awe of the detailed carvings on the reredos.
